record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 641

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 641 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for a second time.

speaking.paragraph: I object to any further proceedings with respect to this bill at this time.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
